Magma dragons have a reputation among other dragons for being unpredictable and brash. Their temperament and tendency for violent outbursts ensure that the typical magma dragon lives a solitary life, with hatchlings often bickering or fighting to establish dominance among themselves before they leave the nest. A magma dragon always has a reason for their outbursts and can always justify their sudden turns in mood, yet they rarely feel the need to do so. Magma dragons build lairs within volcanically active mountains or deep underground amid vast lakes of bubbling magma. As with all true dragons, magma dragons keep hoards of treasure, but the nature of their searing lairs limits the type of valuables they collect to metals, gems, and items capable of resisting the heat of a volcano's core. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 43 **[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 43 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 41 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 [Ancient Magma Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=633) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 95 2.0, [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 81 **Perception** +33; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent (imprecise) 60 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Ignan](/Languages.aspx?ID=18), [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +28, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +36, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +29 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** +4 **Wis** +5 **Cha** +6 --- **AC** 42 **Fort** +34 **Ref** +30 **Will** +31 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 390 **Immunities** fire, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Weaknesses** cold 15 **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 37
**Wing Deflection** **Trigger** The dragon is targeted with an attack; **Effect** The dragon raises a wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is Flying, they descend 10 feet after the attack. --- **Speed** 50 feet, fly 200 feet; magma swim 50 feet **Melee** jaws +36 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+16 piercing plus 4d6 fire **Melee** claw +36 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+16 slashing **Melee** tail +34 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+16 bludgeoning **Melee** horns +34 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+16 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **Cantrips (8th)** [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) - **8th** [Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30) (at will), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (at will) - **Constant (4th)** [Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118) **Breath Weapon** ([Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The dragon breathes a blast of magma that deals 10d6 fire damage and 5d12 bludgeoning damage in a 60-foot cone (DC 40 basic Reflex save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Draconic Frenzy** The dragon makes two claw Strikes and one horn Strike in any order. **Draconic Momentum** The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike. **Magma Swim** A magma dragon's swim Speed functions only when the dragon is Swimming through magma or molten lava. **Magma Tomb** Once per day, the dragon can spit a molten boulder at a target within 120 feet. This deals 12d6 fire damage and 5d12 bludgeoning damage, with a DC 42 basic Reflex save. If the creature fails its save, it's encased in magma that instantly cools and has Hardness 10, HP 40, and BT 20. The encased creature can't breathe and is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) ([Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) DC 42). **Volcanic Purge** If the next action the dragon uses is Breath Weapon, the magma clings to those it damages. Each creature that fails its save against the Breath Weapon takes 5d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), and as long as it has this persistent fire damage, it also takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds.
Magma Dragon Spellcasters To make a magma dragon spellcaster, remove the dragon’s Draconic Frenzy and draconic momentum abilities and give it the following spells. You can swap out any number of these with other primal spells, provided you keep the same number of spells for each level. You might also want to increase the dragon’s Wisdom or Charisma modifier by 1 or 2 to reflect its mastery of magic. **Young Magma Dragon**
**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 28, attack +20; **4th** [_stoneskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=312), [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362); **3rd** [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367); **2nd** [_glitterdust_](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), [_restore senses_](/Spells.aspx?ID=259); **1st** [_air bubble_](/Spells.aspx?ID=5), [_grease_](/Spells.aspx?ID=140), [_pass without trace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=215); **Cantrips (5th)** [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [_light_](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [_read aura_](/Spells.aspx?ID=246) **Adult Magma Dragon**
**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 33, attack +25; As young magma dragon, plus **6th** [_chain lightning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344); **5th** [_cloudkill_](/Spells.aspx?ID=42), [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239); **4th** [_solid fog_](/Spells.aspx?ID=290); **Cantrips (7th)** **Ancient Magma Dragon**
**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 42, attack +34; As adult magma dragon, plus **8th** [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95), [_horrid wilting_](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [_wind walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=376); **7th** [_energy aegis_](/Spells.aspx?ID=100), [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [_volcanic eruption_](/Spells.aspx?ID=360); **6th** [_flesh to stone_](/Spells.aspx?ID=123); **Cantrips (9th)**
